directions: In large mixing bowl, whip cottage cheese and flavored gelatin (right from the box) until smooth. Fold in thawed whipped topping. Cover and chill until serving.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package cranberry flavored Jell-O® mix
1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Creamy Cranberry Salad
